name: Lunar Lander Artemis
description:
Press 'F' to toggle Fullscreen - Press 'S' to toggle Sound on/off - Press 'Q' to Quit.

This is a high-scoring game with only one level (As of now). Go try to get the four stars achievement. ( I am not even sure you can get 5 stars.)

You can't land directly on the space platform as you need more fuel. Grap the fuel can without hitting the ground first.

Precision is key in getting a good high score. For a greater score - Try to have as little Velecoty upon landing. Try to get as close to Zero degrees upon landing. Have as much Fuel left upon landing.

The graphic is inspired by the old monochrome screens in the '70s. It is all intensional with its flickering CRT screen.
